name: JeffStelling'sSportsQuiz
0:
”Alexa open Jeff Stelling's Sports Quiz”
”Alexa ask Jeff Stelling's Sports Quiz for the question of the day”
”Alexa launch Jeff Stelling's Sports Quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jeff stelling's sports quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Jeff Stelling’s Sports quiz!

Test your ultimate sporting knowledge in this fun and competitive trivia game hosted by English sports journalist and TV presenter Jeff Stelling.

Jeff says: “You’ll need to be attack minded to get the better of your opponent in my head-to-head sports quiz! There’s a new set of questions to play every day so don’t forget to keep coming back to earn bonus points, improve your ranking and climb up the leader board! It’s a cracker of a game!”

At the end of the head-to-head contest, you’ll have the chance to tackle Jeff’s Ultimate Sporting Question of the Day to build up your winning streak and climb to the top of the ultimate question leader board!

Things you can say:

• “Help”, if you need help during the game

• “Repeat” To hear what Alexa said again

• “Show me the all-time high scores”, to see the all-time leader board

• “Show me this month’s high scores”, to see the monthly leader board

• “Show me the ultimate high scores”, to see the ultimate question leader board

• “Change my name”, to change your nickname

• “Change my sport”, to change your chosen sport

• “What’s my rank”, to find out your current rank, and what you need to rank up

⭐Yak Yak Games Unlimited⭐

Jeff Stelling's Sports Quiz is part of Yak Yak Games, you can subscribe to get the ability to choose from special sporting question packs, as well as access to premium features in Deal or No Deal, Yak Yak Quiz, Voice Blast, What Came First?, The Million Dollar Money Drop and Song Blast!

You can link your account in the Amazon Alexa app to get email notifications of new updates and features!

Simply say: “Alexa, open Jeff Stelling’s Sports Quiz”, to start playing!

Feedback

Email us at play@yakyakgames.com and tell us what you think. We would love to hear from you!
